column4: Noob question, but what is Nautilus? Is it the file browser GUI within Ubuntu?
- nautilus would be the base, & then you can add plugins to it for the various providers, like google drive, ubuntu one, dropbox, etc

- good on ya. it's a good move, but I advise you, as a new user, to just keep a VirtualBox with windows in spare, in case you need something in a pinch. Wine & WebMin will also greatly ease your transistion
